explains: v. 怀念，渴望（yearn 的现在分词）

sentences.en: He always had a yearning to be a schoolteacher.
sentences.cn: 他一直渴望当一名教师。

sentences.en: Before long the cat was seized by another fit of yearning.
sentences.cn: 不久，那只猫又涌上一阵渴望。

sentences.en: If the arms are outstretched in the yearning position, the person tends to be more suspicious.
sentences.cn: 如果双臂伸出，呈渴望状，这种人往往比较多疑。
